Method Detail

checkUpdateBadges

public static void checkUpdateBadges(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.HTable table,
                                     Commit c,
                                     int numBugs)
This method takes various information from a recent commit, and uses it to check for basic badges. It updates the row in the HBase with the appropriate badges, and information.

Parameters:
table - connection to Hbase
c - commit object
numBugs - number of bugs the user fixed, currently not in use

checkNumericalBadges

public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> checkNumericalBadges(int[] fieldValues,
                                                                         int[] consecCommits)
This method takes in information passed in from the HBase to check for number of commits, and committed person

Parameters:
fieldValues - array of three things, [0] is number of badges in week, [1] is bugs, [2] is number of commits
consecCommits - [0] is committed person, [1] is 2 commits in a day, [2] is 2 commits in >5days
Returns:
ArrayList of acquired badges

checkConsecCommits

public static int[] checkConsecCommits(java.lang.String commitDate,
                                       java.lang.String lastCommit,
                                       int consecCommitsOld)
This method checks to see if there are commits on consecutive days, twice in a day, or greater than 5days

Parameters:
commitDate - New commit date
lastCommit - Previous commit date
consecCommitsOld - Consecutive commits before the newest commit
Returns:
An integer array, [0] is consecutive commits, [1] is commits in a day, [2] is commits in >5days

testDateTimeBadges

public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> testDateTimeBadges(java.lang.String date,
                                                                       java.lang.String dayofWeek,
                                                                       int hour)
This method determines simple date and time badges

Parameters:
date - date of commit
dayofWeek - day of the week user committed
hour - hour of the commit
Returns:
ArrayList of the attained badges
